Name: Akamai Security Events
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description:
The Akamai Security Solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables ingestion of [Akamai Security Solutions](https://www.akamai.com/solutions/security) events using the Common Event Format (CEF) into Microsoft Sentinel for Security Monitoring. 

1. **Akamai Security Events via AMA** - This data connector helps in ingesting Akamai Security Events logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the new Azure Monitor Agent. Learn more about ingesting using the new Azure Monitor Agent [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-cef-ama). **Microsoft recommends using this Data Connector**.

2. **Akamai Security Events via Legacy Agent** - This data connector helps in ingesting Akamai Security Events logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the legacy Log Analytics agent.

**NOTE:** Microsoft recommends installation of Akamai Security Events via AMA Connector. Legacy connector uses the Log Analytics agent which is about to be deprecated by **Aug 31, 2024,** and thus should only be installed where AMA is not supported. Using MMA and AMA on same machine can cause log duplication and extra ingestion cost [more details](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/ama-migrate).
